attributes.action: ensure that rail fares are more transparent and track inflation not operator greed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rail fares are extortionate and are only set to increase as franchises are awarded to greedier operators. Rail operators charge more and more, while investing less and less in service. At a time when the Government is trying to encourage rail travel rail fares should be fairy priced and should track the rate of inflation.
